translations: 旷工；旷课；有计划的怠工；经常无故缺席

sentences.sentence: We predict this will dramatically reduce absenteeism in our schools and workplaces.
sentences.translation: 我们预计，这将大大减少学校和工作场所的旷工现象。

sentences.sentence: Absenteeism and lateness hurt productivity and, since work was specialized, disrupted the regular factory routine.
sentences.translation: 旷工和迟到损害了生产力，而且由于工作是专门化的，这便打乱了工厂的正常工作程序。

sentences.sentence: An innovative treatment has come to our attention that promises to significantly reduce absenteeism in our schools and workplaces.
sentences.translation: 一种创新的治疗方法引起了我们的注意，它有望大大减少我们学校和工作场所的缺勤现象。
